title: ATypI Barcelona call for presentations
content:
The deadline for submitting presentation proposals for ATypI 2014 was last Saturday, March 14. Like a few others, the deadline caught me by surprise. I'm informed by the secretariat that the deadline for submissions has been extended until Monday, March 24.

For details on the types of sessions that are being planned, and the confence theme, see:  
 [http://www.atypi.org/barcelona-2014](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803143239/http:/www.atypi.org/barcelona-2014 "http://www.atypi.org/barcelona-2014")
author: enne_son
